Union_City.Rahway Township, New Jersey:
Rahway Township was a township in New Jersey, United States, that existed from 1804 until it was dissolved in 1861.
Rahway was formed as a township by an Act of the New Jersey Legislature on February 27, 1804, from portions of Elizabeth Township and Westfield Township, while the area was still part of Essex County, New Jersey. On March 19, 1857, it became part of the newly created Union County.
